text: Aaron Carter is recovering from what he's called a ` ` severe'' car accident that left him with a broken nose and a totaled car. In a series of tweets posted last night ( September 5 ), Carter unveiled a story of a collision that left his prized BMW busted and him with several injuries. ` ` I never meant to get into an accident as severe as this. I've ran into people before and honestly nothing compares to what happened today,'' he began. ` ` TBH this s - - - hurts my arms hurt my legs hurt all my airbags went off I broke my nose this is f - - - - - up...'' Eventually, though, he insisted ` ` Everything is fine'' before fan concern started pouring in. Then, he thanked
